chat.title: RAG Demo Chatbot
chat.welcomeMessage: Welcome! I'm your RAG-powered assistant. I can help you find information quickly and accurately.
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please make sure the backend server is running and try again.

documentUpload.title: Upload Documents
documentUpload.description: Upload PDF documents to the RAG system for AI-powered question answering.
documentUpload.successMessage: Document has been successfully processed and indexed.
documentUpload.uploadFailedMessage: Failed to upload document. Make sure the backend is running.

websiteIngestion.title: Ingest Website Content
websiteIngestion.description: Scrape and index content from websites to enhance the knowledge base.
websiteIngestion.frameworkHint: Select if the website uses a JavaScript framework
websiteIngestion.routesPlaceholder:
Enter routes separated by commas or new lines
Example: /home, /about, /products, /contact
websiteIngestion.routesHint: Enter the routes you want to scrape (e.g., /home, /about, /products)
websiteIngestion.urlRequiredMessage: Please enter a website URL to ingest.
websiteIngestion.routesRequiredMessage: Please enter at least one route for the selected framework.
websiteIngestion.ingestionFailedMessage: Failed to ingest website. Please check the URL and try again.

items.documentUpload: Document Upload: Supports PDF files for direct upload and indexing
items.websiteIngestion: Website Ingestion: Extracts and indexes text content from web pages
items.frameworkSupport: Framework Support: Optimized scraping for Angular, React, Vue, and static websites
items.customRoutes: Custom Routes: Specify exact routes to scrape for SPA frameworks (e.g., /home, /about, /products)
items.linkedPages: Linked Pages: Optionally crawl and index linked pages up to 3 levels deep
items.processing: Processing: All content is automatically chunked and embedded for semantic search

documentUpload.successMessage: Document has been successfully processed and indexed.
documentUpload.uploadFailedMessage: Failed to upload document. Make sure the backend is running.
